name: Marine General of Heavenly Silk, Lambros
effect:
[CONT](Hand):If you have a vanguard with "Thavas" in its card name, this card gets grade -1.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, choose any number of your rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a column, [Stand] all of your rear-guards in that column, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have two or more cards in your soul with "Shiranui" in their card names, this unit gets [Power] +15000, and you perform drive checks for the battles your Mask of Domination token attacked.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], choose a unit card from your opponent's (RC) or drop zone, and bind it. If you bound a card, call a Mask of Domination token to your back row center (RC), and until end of turn, that token gets the original grade, [Power] , [Critical] , and abilities of the card bound by this effect, and can attack from your back row center (RC). At the end of that turn, remove that token.

name: Exxtreme Battler, Victor
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, call up to one grade 2 or less card with "Extreme Battler" in its card name from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it. If that rear-guard [Stand] two or more times this turn by a card's ability, this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn. (Includes [Stand] from this ability)

name: Sage-saint Mentor of Black Lacquer, Isabelle
effect:
[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you perform both of the effects for "perform one of the effects".
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at three cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your unit's [AUTO] abilities with "when placed,", and activate it. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. (Does not mean cost and conditions of that [AUTO] can be ignored)

effect:

[ACT](VC):[COST][Discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to one "Demon Stealth Dragon, Shiranui "Oboro"", ride it as [Stand], and shuffle your deck.
